meanings.definition: To visit and observe places of interest as a tourist.
meanings.sent1: We will sightsee the famous landmarks in the city.
meanings.sent2: During our vacation, we plan to sightsee around the area.
meanings.sent3: Let's sightsee the town and discover hidden gems!
meanings.sent4: Sightseeing the bustling streets, we felt like explorers in a new world.
meanings.sent5: The tour guide encouraged us to sightsee with enthusiasm and curiosity.

meanings.definition: The activity of visiting and seeing places of interest.
meanings.sent1: Sightseeing is a popular way to explore new destinations.
meanings.sent2: We enjoyed the sightsee of the historical sites.
meanings.sent3: The children's favorite part of the trip was the sightsee of the zoo.
meanings.sent4: The sightsee of the breathtaking landscape left us in awe.
meanings.sent5: Joining the sightsee tour allowed us to learn about the city's history.
